message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $13,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. How about we meet at $11,000?
